mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_basic_channel (account_id, channel_short_name, channel_code, channel_name, channel_type_sign, support_way, third_company, channel_source, basic_trade_rate, basic_withdraw_fee, basic_balance_type, basic_settle_type, limit_min_amount, limit_amount, lowest_fee, is_need, is_use, channel_company, remarks, status )VALUES( #{accountId}, #{channelShortName}, #{channelCode}, #{channelName}, #{channelTypeSign}, #{supportWay}, #{thirdCompany}, #{channelSource}, #{basicTradeRate}, #{basicWithdrawFee}, #{basicBalanceType}, #{basicSettleType}, #{limitMinAmount}, #{limitAmount}, #{lowestFee}, #{isNeed}, #{isUse}, #{channelCompany}, #{remarks}, #{status} )
